argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | recld2.1 | |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_cnfldtopon | |- J e. ( TopOn ` CC ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_toponunii | |- CC = U. J |
| 4 | 3 | #P_restid | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` CC ) -> ( J |`t CC ) = J ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( J |`t CC ) = J |
| 6 |  | #P_recn | |- ( y e. RR -> y e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_addcl | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( x + y ) e. CC ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. RR ) -> ( x + y ) e. CC ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ssid | |- CC C_ CC |
| 10 | 1, 8, 9 | #P_reperflem | |- ( J |`t CC ) e. Perf |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_eqeltrri | |- J e. Perf |
